price: Ce qui demeure auprès d’Allah est meilleur pour vous si vous êtes croyants! Et je ne suis pas un gardien pour vous."
arabic: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: baqiyyatu al-lahi khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minīna wamā anā ʿalaykum biḥafīẓin
